animeTitle: Eguchi Hisashi no Kotobuki Gorou Show
animeDescription: Based on the gag manga by Hisashi Eguchi.Originally released as a feature part of Studio Pierrot's video magazine show Anime V Comic Rentaman (アニメ・V・コミック レンタマン) along with Abashiri Ikka, Yumemakura Baku Twilight Gekijou and Akai Hayate. (Source: AniDB)
